If Chris and Ryan put together their marbles in a pile, the pile will have 12+28 = <<12+28=36>>36 marbles.
If they then take 1/4 of the marbles each, every person will receive 1/4*36 = <<1/4*36=9>>9 marbles.
Both of them will have taken a total of 9+9 = <<9+9=18>>18 marbles.
The number of marbles remaining in the pile is 36-18 = <<36-18=18>>18
